divs: Sighting Details I was hanging out the window did not hear a sound pointed it out to my brother did not take 5 to 10 second for him to put his back on the window and point up to the object and took off with no sound ..not flying .... but hovering over our building at this time and place that were not the only that could have seen that.we try to inform our mother and she brush off. to this day still talk about it like it happen yesterday.willing to be tested p.s went tore the lake.....the ship sat in a angle took off over lake mich,
Summary: Me and my brother watches out the window every night, This normal night looking could not believe it I seen it first .
